issue.subject: #__sdi_sys_orderstate : elments ordering is not set
issue.description:
In table #__sdi_sys_orderstate, there's an ordering field, but the order is not set (it is the ID).
I propose that it fits the 'application order' + the special cases at the end, for lists etc.

Current order:
|_.id|_.ordering ↑|_.value|
|1|1|archived|
|2|2|historized|
|3|3|finish|
|4|4|await|
|5|5|progress|
|6|6|sent|
|7|7|saved|
|8|8|validation|
|9|9|rejectedbythirdparty|
|10|10|rejectedbysupplier|

Proposed order:
|_.id|_.ordering ↑|_.value|
|7|1|saved|
|8|2|validation|
|6|3|sent|
|4|4|await|
|5|5|progress|
|3|6|finish|
|1|7|archived|
|2|8|historized|
|9|9|rejectedbythirdparty|
|10|10|rejectedbysupplier|
